name: Subway Ice Princess
description:
Subway ice princess is best surf runner game. Princess surfs in snow subway to make happy in endless running. Experience infinite control with your loved princess running!

Enjoy times fun with your loved princess. Run along the craziest scenarios in the subway ice. To be the best princess surf runner. Explore new worlds: Ice subway, city, forest and beach. Gather all the coins you can in the subway running!

It is easy to control for anyone. ONLY to run left or right, jump or slide to escape oncoming trains. Help ice princess runner improve running performance. Upgrade Coin magnet, 2X multipliers, jet pack, score booster, mega head start. The more props you upgrade, the high scores you will get!
